scripts.archive: npm run clean && trash .env && npm run build && trash ./static && cpy ./original-static ./static && cpy ./public ./static && echo GATSBY_ARCHIVE_TIME=$(npx date-cli) > .env
scripts.archive:dev: npm run clean && trash .env && npm run build:dev && trash ./static && cpy ./original-static ./static && cpy ./public ./static && echo GATSBY_ARCHIVE_TIME=$(npx date-cli) > .env
